Hellpeon looks to Darkfate, his eyes narrowing as he becomes annoyed 
at the bot questioning his orders. Howeer before he can speak 
Hellpeon begisn to glow a bright blue as Frostbite, the Infecticon 
mission leader takes control of his body and mind for the moment. The 
beast then once agains speaks but this time in a much calmer and more 
feminine tone.

Hellpeon/Frostbite: "I will order Hellpeon to alloy your men ample 
time to escape the base. However you must agree to bring you, a 
portion of your men, and some supplies and follow Hellpeon to our 
base. We will need your assistance in the consturction in a device we 
need built to further our goals here."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Darkfate:
> 
> "I see" said Darkfate "You're right when you said that warriors are 
> expendables... but it's a pity that a good warrior lost the live... 
> dificulty you can find one in a thousand... but think in this, 
> Hellpeon, I can do that your task become easiest than is now... 
it's 
> easy you said, but I can do it more... while I do that I can free 
my 
> allies and you just have to give them a chance to move far of the 
> base and then we can... destroy the Trainers..."
> 
>
